name: Radiance Serum
description: A lightweight, fast-absorbing serum that brightens and evens skin tone with vitamin C and hyaluronic acid.

name: Velvet Matte Lipstick
description: Long-lasting matte lipstick with a velvety smooth finish. Enriched with vitamin E for soft, hydrated lips.

name: Rose Garden Perfume
description: A romantic floral fragrance with notes of Bulgarian rose, jasmine, and white musk.

name: Hydrating Face Cream
description: Rich, nourishing cream that deeply hydrates and restores skin's natural barrier.

name: Luminous Foundation
description: Buildable coverage foundation with a natural, luminous finish. SPF 30 protection.

name: Gentle Cleansing Oil
description: Luxurious oil cleanser that melts away makeup and impurities while nourishing skin.

name: Silk Eyeshadow Palette
description: 12 highly pigmented shades in matte and shimmer finishes for endless eye looks.

name: Citrus Bloom Eau de Toilette
description: Fresh and uplifting fragrance with notes of bergamot, neroli, and white tea.

name: Overnight Recovery Mask
description: Intensive overnight treatment that repairs and rejuvenates skin while you sleep.

name: Cream Blush Stick
description: Creamy, blendable blush stick for a natural, healthy flush of color.

name: Exfoliating Toner
description: Gentle exfoliating toner with AHAs and BHAs to refine pores and smooth texture.

name: Vanilla Orchid Body Mist
description: Light, refreshing body mist with warm vanilla and exotic orchid notes.
